holidays.title: National Beer Lovers Day
holidays.description: Let's all sing, "99 Bottles of Beer on the Wall."

holidays.title: Brazil Independence Day
holidays.description: Or as they say in Brazil — Sete de Setembro!

holidays.title: Buy a Book Day
holidays.description: Suit up, we are going to buy and read some awesome books!

holidays.title: Fluidra International Pool Pro Day
holidays.description: Let's celebrate the excellent work of pool professionals on Fluidra International Pool Pro Day!

holidays.title: Global Talent Acquisition Day
holidays.description: Learn about talent acquisition’s origins and its role in employment on Global Talent Acquisition Day.

holidays.title: Google Commemoration Day
holidays.description: Get your keypads and keyboards at the ready, it’s time to celebrate Google Commemoration Day.

holidays.title: Grandma Moses Day
holidays.description: Grandma Moses Day is a reminder that it’s never too late to start afresh.

holidays.title: Indigenous Literacy Day
holidays.description: Settle in for some much-needed unlearning today as we observe Indigenous Literacy Day.

holidays.title: International Day of Clean Air
holidays.description: An estimated seven million people worldwide die from diseases related to unclean air each year.

holidays.title: International Day of Clean Air for Blue Skies
holidays.description: Take action today to reduce air pollution and bring about a fundamental change in our world.

holidays.title: National Acorn Squash Day
holidays.description: Just as sweet as it is healthy, this celebration will keep your taste buds wanting more.

holidays.title: National Feel the Love Day
holidays.description: National Feel the Love Day is a celebration of everyone and everything that brings us joy.

holidays.title: National First Day of Peel Season
holidays.description: This is the perfect time of the year to give your skin some extra T.L.C.

holidays.title: National Grateful Patient Day
holidays.description: An amazing healthcare worker matches perfectly with a grateful patient. Be one today!

holidays.title: National Neither Snow Nor Rain Day
holidays.description: Through sunshine and hail, our postal service workers are here to stay.

holidays.title: National New Hampshire Day
holidays.description: National New Hampshire Day is a celebration of the state’s beautiful culture, landscapes, and history.

holidays.title: National Regina Day
holidays.description: It’s the day of queens; join the celebrations for National Regina Day.

holidays.title: National Salami Day
holidays.description: Meat lovers gather around, as we dig into the delicious celebration of this world-renowned sausage!

holidays.title: National Tatiana Day
holidays.description: Get prepared, Tatianas, as we commemorate your unique name on National Tatiana Day.

holidays.title: Onam
holidays.description: Celebrating the rice harvest, Onam is one of the three primary Hindu celebrations.

holidays.title: Superhuman Day
holidays.description: Explore the power of real superhumans in this world — people who overcome challenges!

holidays.title: Texas Energy Savings Day
holidays.description: The majority of Texans are overpaying for their electricity, and with so many complicated plans and bills, many Texans don't even realize it.

holidays.title: World Duchenne Awareness Day
holidays.description: The first step to progress is awareness —  join us as we dive in to learn more.

holidays.title: Buddy Holly’s Birthday
holidays.description: The American rock singer was a central figure of mid-20th century rock and roll.

holidays.title: Eazy-E’s Birthday
holidays.description: This talented rapper can rest in peace knowing his legacy will always remain timeless and untainted.

holidays.title: Hulk the Dog’s Birthday
holidays.description: This special dog has great potential and is every dog lover’s dream.

holidays.title: Ivan Cervantes’s Birthday
holidays.description: For this TikTok star and internet personality, greatness is one post away.

holidays.title: Ruth Righi’s Birthday
holidays.description: This talented actress is destined for greatness, and we can't wait to see what’s next.
